profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks such as website system development, server operations, maintenance, performance tuning, and integration of various components (PHP, Node.js, Frontend). There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, LLMs, prompt engineering, RAG, or any AI-specific model development or specialization. The tasks clearly fall under Macro-Category A, with no indication of Macro-Category B tasks. Therefore, the profile is 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear about the nature of the role, listing specific software engineering tasks and technologies. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
